project.title: SaaS Solution Elevates Gatsby’s Influencer Game
project.overview: Built a full-featured SaaS platform (Gatsby) that helps Shopify merchants convert social media engagement (Instagram, TikTok) into customer data and influencer-driven growth — enabling merchants to discover, manage and automate micro-influencer and ambassador programs, with deep integrations across marketing, loyalty, CRM and automation tools.

core_value_proposition.social_to_subscriber_conversion: Convert Instagram/TikTok followers into email & SMS subscribers to grow marketing lists directly from social engagement. :contentReference[oaicite:1]{index=1}
core_value_proposition.influencer_discovery_from_customers: Automatically identify customers or site visitors who qualify as micro-influencers (based on follower-count, social reach, bio keywords, engagement) — enabling micro-influencer campaigns without manual outreach. :contentReference[oaicite:2]{index=2}
core_value_proposition.UGC & Social Interaction Tracking: Track Instagram/TikTok content associated with your brand; gather engagement metrics & media assets in a unified dashboard. :contentReference[oaicite:3]{index=3}
core_value_proposition.Marketing / CRM / Loyalty / Automation I: Seamlessly integrate with marketing & loyalty tools like email/SMS (e.g. Klaviyo, Attentive), loyalty & rewards (e.g. LoyaltyLion, Yotpo), CRM/marketing automation (e.g. HubSpot, Omnisend) — enabling automated flows for influencer onboarding, rewards, follow-ups and sales tracking. :contentReference[oaicite:4]{index=4}
core_value_proposition.Ambassador Program Automation & Performa: Allow merchants to run automated ambassador / UGC / referral programs: detect influencers, send them dynamic coupon/referral/loyalty codes, track their social posts & UGC, measure conversions & revenue, and manage communication — saving manual work and scaling authenticity. :contentReference[oaicite:5]{index=5}

integrations.name: Klaviyo
integrations.role: Email/SMS marketing & list growth from social

integrations.name: Gorgias
integrations.role: Customer support / helpdesk — connects social & UGC data with support workflow

integrations.name: Stamped
integrations.role: Reviews / UGC / loyalty / social proof & reputation

integrations.name: Zapier
integrations.role: Workflow automation / custom integrations / webhook orchestration

integrations.name: Webhooks
integrations.role: Custom triggers, event-based automation for non-standard workflows

key_features.social_signup_capture: Allow Instagram/TikTok followers to subscribe via DMs or popups — converting social audience into owned email & SMS lists. :contentReference[oaicite:6]{index=6}
key_features.UGC_media_tracking: Track UGC: posts, stories, reels, mentions, tags, DMs, comments; aggregate media assets + engagement metrics; allow downloadable content. :contentReference[oaicite:7]{index=7}
key_features.Influencer_scoring_and_segmentation: Based on follower count, engagement, bio keywords — produce a ‘G Score’ to identify ideal micro-influencers / ambassadors. :contentReference[oaicite:8]{index=8}
key_features.Automated Ambassador & Influencer Campai: Trigger flows based on social events (e.g. story mentions, tags, DMs) — auto-reply, send discount / referral / loyalty codes, enroll in ambassador programs. :contentReference[oaicite:9]{index=9}
key_features.Integration with Email/SMS, Loyalty, CRM: Connect social/customer data to marketing stack — enabling segmentation, flows, loyalty enrollment, UGC reviews, referrals. :contentReference[oaicite:10]{index=10}
key_features.Engagement & Revenue Analytics: Track influencer performance: engagement metrics, social reach, UGC conversions, sales from referrals/discounts — to measure ROI of influencer campaigns. :contentReference[oaicite:11]{index=11}
key_features.Flexible Setup (Popups, Forms, Checkout,: Supports multiple ways to collect social handles — via popups, checkout fields (Shopify Plus), custom forms, etc. :contentReference[oaicite:12]{index=12}

observed_use_cases_and_workflows: Social follower → DM / popup subscribe → email/SMS list growth
Identify customers with high social reach → automatic influencer scoring → send invite via email/SMS/referral coupon → track UGC + purchases → reward influencer/referrer
Ambassador/referral program via loyalty/rewards integration (LoyaltyLion, WhiteLabelLoyalty, etc.)
Collect product reviews & UGC via Yotpo/Stamped + integrate with CRM and marketing automation
CRM and customer support integration (e.g. HubSpot, Gorgias) to combine social data with support history and loyalty status
Automation via Zapier / Webhooks for custom flows where pre-built integrations are insufficient
